name: Structural Objects — Theorems, Axiom Boxes, Layers, Tri-Unity
purpose: Define the canonical structural templates (Theorem, Axiom Box, Layer, Tri-Unity object, Module) used to build all higher-tier content in MBC-4.0.

used\_by: Module Packs for μ, λ, ψ, Σ, Θ, χ, Ω, ρ
cross\_links.structural\_role: Tier-3 defines the meta-objects that package operators, interactions, and axioms.

notes: This tier is structural. It defines how mathematical content is boxed, not new mathematical operators themselves.
